UserStory.heading: Health Point
UserStory.Description: As a user, I want the game has a proper health point (HP) so that health status can be sufficiently determined and monitored.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 血量的显示，受到伤害时的血量变化
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features, even though it depends on how player performs. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation. Confirmation of specific details can be negotiated. V - Yes. Users will be beneficial by knowing the status of the health point and make an appropriate step to save life if needs be. The player will have better in-game experience. E - Yes. It can be estimated how long it will take since it is a small feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore completed in one iteration or Sprint. T - Yes. It can be tested and verified by playing the game.

Tests.Test: Health Point (HP) must have color.
Check the value of damage taken by the player is deducted from the Health Point (HP).
The reduced Health Point (HP) is transparent(scene background).
